casebody.data:
McCALLISTER
v.
SUPERIOR COURT. No. 290P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of June 2008 by Plaintiff to Disqualify Judge:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
